title: Forecast CAGR global digital health market by major segment 2015 to 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 for 5 number of Names.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is appeared to be the highest at Name Mobile health and lowest at Name EHR/EMR.
The highest Name Mobile health has 37.0 more Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 than the lowest Name EHR/EMR.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 in each Name on the y axis.
The maximum Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 41.0 is found at Name Mobile health and the minimum is found at EHR/EMR where Name is 4.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 for 5 number of Names.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is appeared to be the highest at Name Mobile health and lowest at Name EHR/EMR.
The highest Name Mobile health has 37.0 more Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 than the lowest Name EHR/EMR.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 in each Name on the y axis.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is appeared to be the highest at Name Mobile health and lowest at Name EHR/EMR.
There is a difference of 37.0 between the maximum Name Mobile health and minimum Name EHR/EMR.
The Name Mobile health has the highest Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020, followed by Wireless health, and Average. Down to the Name EHR/EMR which is the lowest.
The highest value 41.0 at Mobile health is almost 1.97 times larger than the average value 20.8.
